wf_element_activity.description: Removes CMS WWW Server from Nagios to reset Demo
wf_element_activity.name: Reset Demo

wf_activity.notes:
There is a newer version of this activity.
To update the activity, check out the workflow, select the activity, right click and select 'Update activity' to use the latest version, then publish the workflow
